title: Portfolio (this page!)
description: This site is built in React and uses all original components. Some of the cooler features (IMHO) include the dual-purpose navigation and section header, project slider, totally responsive layout, and original themed color block design, and serverless contact form functionality using AWS Lambda.

title: Lighthouse Audit Automation
description: This is a node package to automate Google Lighthouse audits on multiple sites simultaneously. Given a root URL and array of directories/subdirectories/pages, this outputs a .csv containing two tables (mobile and desktop) with metrics for performance, accessibility, adherence to best practices, and SEO.

title: Starter Pack
description: Starter Pack is a WordPress plugin I wrote to assist with devving on custom WordPress themes and plugins. It provides helpful utility functions for debugging and logging throughout the development process as well as a host of security features perfect for jump starting work on any new WordPress site.

title: My Music Page
description: My landing page as a professional musician. It is a mobile-first, responsive site that uses semantic HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and PHP. Since I initially built this site as the final project of my Code Louisville Front End Web Development course, it's packed with fun JS scripts. Check out the README in my GitHub repo for a full list of design features.

title: Louisville Jazz Initiative
description: This is the website for the Louisville Jazz Initiative, a non profit organization I co-founded in April 2021. I built this website before knowing about mobile-first design, accessibilty standards, and CSS flexbox and am now in the process of updating it to reflect best practices.

title: Code Breaker
description: This is my take on the classic paper and pencil game: Mastermind. The notebook paper styling has been fun to experiment with but needs a little more tweaking to be made more responsive. Check it out, play to your hearts content (it's pretty addicting!) and offer any suggestions.

title: Fiber Coven
description: Fiber Coven is a weekly witchy themed podcast about knitting, spinning, and everything fiber related. Making this website was a great opportunity to work with an established brand and integrate third party widgets like a PodBean player and MailChimp newsletter sign up into the design.
